# Decision-Making

[Home](../../../../README.md) / [Practical Wisdom](../../../../practical_wisdom/README.md) / [Skill Development](../../../practical_wisdom/skill_development/README.md)

## Key Concepts

### Rationality

The use of logical reasoning and evidence-based information to make informed decisions.

### Intuition

The ability to make decisions based on instinct or subconscious patterns of thought.

### Ethical Considerations

The incorporation of moral principles and values into the decision-making process.

### Risk Assessment

The evaluation of potential risks and consequences associated with different courses of action.
